questions.question_text:
Universal Containers uses Contracts for agreements with customers. A sales manager is required to provide approval for contracts and director approval for any contract over $10,000.
Which two options should an app builder use to ensure all contracts route for the correct approval and also prevent the sales rep from making changes to the record while it is being approved? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Create a validation rule on the Contract object that prevents updates to the contract record while it is being reviewed.
choices.A: Create an approval process on the Contract object with one step for each sales manager that sets the approver as the director.
choices.D: Create an approval process on the Contract object and set the field for 'Next Automated Approver Determined By' as 'Manager'.
choices.C: Create an approval process on the Contract object with criteria set on a second approval step as 'Amount__c > 10,000' and set the approver as director.

discussion.content:
I think the answers are C & D.
